message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1600000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1300000. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for that price?

I understand that you're looking to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1500000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for that price?
